channel.title: [BUG] Killed as Possessor while jumping
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was the Possessor, and I was trying to possess a player. The jump worked (got the message saying I took control of their body, and that they were a Knight), but I died to my own attack as Possessor after that. I basically possessed myself as Possessor. There was a lag spike as the night ended, and I got feedback multiple times... that probably had something to do with it. Additionally, I had used Facelift to disguise myself as a Hunter when I jumped, but after my death I showed up as Possessor anyway. The Knight stayed alive on the player tab, but they were in the dead chat with me (similar to if they had been reaped).
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should have been able to jump to them without issue.
#### Steps to reproduce: Possess someone during a lag spike.
#### Comments: Screenshot of the feedback ![bug|489x500](upload://dcZcUPEZMHdO6JPzb7fhEC2pbEC.png)
